name: Volvum
description:
Can you survive even one night?

The Game's goal is simple - escape from the abandoned psychiatric hospital called "Manas Hill", whose old and gloomy outlook perfect shows its character. This place, shrouded in mystery is hiding many dark secrets. During the escape, not only cluttered walls and dead ends will make it harder. Together with you in the hospital will be "undead" patients, which in this hospital experimented. It remains to ask yourself one question: Can you survive even one night?

Remember! This is my first game and it is still in development.

To do:

  • Fix bugs
  • Make it more scary

Give us suggestions, report bugs and glitches in comments.

Version: 1.01.2 Build: 4
